bibl.title: The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen

bibl.seg: VAN KOOTEN George H., 'Wrath will Drip in the Plains of Macedonia': Expectations of Nero's Return in the Egyptian Sibylline Oracles (Book 5), 2 Thessalonians, and Ancient Historical Writings.

Anthony HILHORST and George H. VAN KOOTEN (Edd.), The Wisdom of Egypt. Jewish, Early Christian and Gnostic Essays in Honour of Gerard P. Luttikhuizen = Ancient Judaism and Early Christianity. 59 (Leiden - Boston, 2005) pp. 177-215.
See in part. pp. 182-183: Nero and Egypt.
